"Waspinator not know" Waspinator replied clueless as to what was 
going on.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> Perceptor::
> 
> Perceptor said "Well my master... this weapon act quickly and 
> Waspanator, kindly, offered his help to show how fuction "Perceptor 
> was a sacarstic smile while he said that and he added"Are you ready 
> Waspanator?"
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "x_rauq_x" <x_rauq_x@y...> wrote:
> > -- Megatron --
> > 
> > Megatron notices Perceptor and Waspinator, but ignores them for a 
> > time as he examins the terrain in which the base is located. He 
> adds 
> > a few markers to the maps, then presses a button and the map 
> > disappears with a click.
> > 
> > Megatron turn to face Perceptor, "Yes Perceptor? What is it." He 
> > face shows nothing, but he hopes, for Perceptor's sake, that this 
> > wouldn't take long. Switchblade should have all the weapons ready 
> to 
> > be set up, and they needed defenses quickly.
> > 
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "catmastero" <catmastero@y...> wrote:

> > > Waspinator followed Preceptor sipping his Energon Drink.

MEgatron
